This chunk defines the core class `AppShell` which serves as a foundation for creating graphical user interfaces (GUIs) with configurable parameters such as application metadata (version, name, copyright), contact information, UI dimensions, padding, and control flags for command and status areas. The class inherits from `Pmw.MegaWidget` and `DirectObject`, suggesting it is part of a larger GUI framework or application shell implementation.

class AppShell(Pmw.MegaWidget, DirectObject):
    appversion      = '1.0'
    appname         = 'Generic Application Frame'
    copyright       = ('Copyright 2004 Walt Disney Imagineering.' +
                       ' All Rights Reserved')
    contactname     = 'Mark R. Mine'
    contactphone    = '(818) 544-2921'
    contactemail    = 'Mark.Mine@disney.com'

    frameWidth      = 450
    frameHeight     = 320
    padx            = 5
    pady            = 5
    usecommandarea  = 0
    usestatusarea   = 0
    balloonState    = 'none'
    panelCount      = 0
